query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'files' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'extractedMetadata';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2nXHNKWaT6KdAop.2df66c7cd877 --database SaoZcd7riW2zyxorRaqL7d --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() AND TABLE_NAME = 'files' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'extractedMetadata';
